body.p: To further improve its ability to create online documentation, offers support to transform DocBook And DITA documents into Mobile WebHelp systems. This feature generates an output that works on multiple platforms (Android, iOS, BlackBerry, Windows Mobile) and is specially designed for mobile devices. All the specific touch screen gestures are supported. The functionality of the desktop WebHelp layout is preserved, is organized in an intuitive layout, and offers table of contents, search capabilities, and index navigation.
